title: Kein RP-Refill auf dem PBE
body:
Ich bekomme keine RP mehr auf dem PBE.
Warte schon 4 Tage

replies.body:
Hey Beschwörer,

dies ist schon seit einiger Zeit deaktiviert da es Probleme damit gab. Stand jetzt kann man nicht sagen wann es wieder aktiviert wird.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot skiteacher2,realm=PBE,application-id=AYQh7p7O,discussion-id=HpAQL7wL,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-18T23:56:49.066+0000)
>
> Hi All:
> 
> TL;DR - Replacing daily RP granting with mission with BE reward for playing a game; content available for testing will be priced at 1 BE.
> 
> Four months ago, [we posted about broken RP grants in PBE](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/dM75EUEY-pbe-and-rp). At that time, we believed we would have a fix soon, but after several attempts to restore the daily RP grants, we haven't been able to make significant progress. Because RP is actually money, it's controlled by a transactional accounting system which doesn't allow mass updates. 
> 
> To ensure PBE testers have access to BE, we'll be permanently adding a mission called "PBE Blue Essence Bonus"; starting December 19, 2018 at 5:00 PM PST. This mission will grant 50 BE for playing one game on PBE, and will have a 4 hour cool down. 
> 
> We've also adjusted content pricing to support these changes. The following content will be available for 1 BE in PBE:
> 
> * All champions
> * All upcoming and recently released skins
> * All skins for champions getting a champion update


Gruß Yatsuki
